pages.body:
# ZeroMe

Zite: [Me.ZeroNetwork.bit](/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/)

ZeroMe is the social network of ZeroNet, made by [[Nofish]]. Users can share texts and photos; and comment on posts of other profiles. Users can also follow other users and hit a like button in posts.

In a proposal by [[Mkg20001]], users will be able to use a background image/color in their profiles.

To use [[zerome|ZeroMe]] you need to choose a [[hubs|hub]].

### Features
* Make posts that include text and images
* Choose an avatar image
* Follow other users
* Help distribute a user's images
* Mute a user

**Text:**
* Some [[markdown]] formatting allowed, like italic, bold, block quote etc.

**Images:**
* JPG and PNG formats allowed.
* Animation in images does not work (e.g. animated GIFs, APNGs)
* Transparency replaced with white background.

### Other interfaces
The ZeroMe social network can be accessed through alternative interfaces:
+ (Original) ZeroMe - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MeFqFfFFGQfa1J3gJyYYUvb5Lksczq7nH by @nofish
+ ZeroMe Reloaded (Me.Mkg20001.bit) - http://127.0.0.1:43110/19ndUQE2x3NbhGhGZsstuWz2sy9f7uVT6G by @Mkg20001
+ Peeper.bit - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PEEPJuD41shof53g3WauQKi4k4wVe3Vzu by @Daniell mesquita
+ ZeroMePlus - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6 by @talnicrom
+ Sakana.bit - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1SAkaNabHzB8ovdGXxfEbmfdWkJ6ay3yt by @ixhb5a7vwvdgimjx

# ZeroMe

Zite: [Me.ZeroNetwork.bit](/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/)

ZeroMe is the social network of ZeroNet, made by [[Nofish]]. Users can share texts and photos; and comment on posts of other profiles. Users can also follow other users and hit a like button in posts.

In a proposal by [[Mkg20001]], users will be able to use a background image/color in their profiles.

To use [[zerome|ZeroMe]] you need to choose a [[hubs|hub]].

### Features
* Make posts that include text and images
* Choose an avatar image
* Follow other users
* Help distribute a user's images
* Mute a user

**Text:**
* Some [[markdown]] formatting allowed, like italic, bold, block quote etc.

**Images:**
* JPG and PNG formats allowed.
* Animation in images does not work (e.g. animated GIFs, APNGs)
* Transparency replaced with white background.

### Other interfaces
The ZeroMe social network can be accessed through alternative interfaces:
+ ZeroMe - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MeFqFfFFGQfa1J3gJyYYUvb5Lksczq7nH by @nofish
+ ZeroMe Reloaded (Me.Mkg20001.bit) - http://127.0.0.1:43110/19ndUQE2x3NbhGhGZsstuWz2sy9f7uVT6G by @Mkg20001
+ Peeper.bit - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PEEPJuD41shof53g3WauQKi4k4wVe3Vzu by @Daniell mesquita
+ ZeroMePlus - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6 by @talnicrom
+ Sakana.bit - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1SAkaNabHzB8ovdGXxfEbmfdWkJ6ay3yt by @ixhb5a7vwvdgimjx

File-Sharing sites
=======

Here is a collection of various file-sharing sites found around ZeroNet. If you don't see one listed here please add it.


**Books :**
   * [AntiLibrary](/Antilibrary.bit/): Uses IFS to maintain book catalogs that are separated by languages.
   * [ZeroPub](/zeropub.bit/)

**Files :**
   * [BinChan's 0-Share](/1Dphm8Mth9WYN9fPm1yxj8Y4WhcKRhYXJJ/): Similar to ZeroUP.
   * [Intergalactic File Server](/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er): Uses IFS
   * [ZeroUP](/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/): File hosting with a file type and size restriction (10MB - 200MB) (popular)
   * [ZeroUP Unlimited](/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/): ZeroUP clone that allows files up to 1GB.

**Important Files :**
   * [Manually Maintained Directories](/15Pf9VVuDT8NSWj1qUBh4V89yPmrmzRw6a/)

**Magnet Links :**
   * [Box-HD](/BoxHD.bit): HD TV Series Box Sets delivered in a 'Play' style UI
   * [KickAssTorrent (KAT)](/1LBr1dHoXvJAMjDgW8Wcg5kbCoKyJnzo6p/): KAT in pre alpha version
   * [Play+](/1J3JSAxiM3uhpkp2dymY59yud8r2RGW6MA/)
   * [Play Anime](/1AnimePihDhcbVdK1nvnbSEtH4oKU8RAYG/): A wide selection of titles from the Anime genre.
   * [Play Movies](/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/): A wide selection of titles of various classic genres
   * [TV Episodes](/tvepisodes.bit/): tvepisodes.bit is a weekly feed of TV episodes.
   * [ZeroTV](/1BEJbnufyav7TK23ADTs2Qi2UJeKSGDzw6/): Download TV Series. (Down/Empty)
   * [ZeroTV mirror](/1HwH4hfRhohJGVtZMBYprYKyHcuJNwL4sZ/)
   * [UA реліз](/1UkrrSpnJmuiig6r5v88Kn3isaR64Fbh3): advanced torrent index with search function
   * [_hot_buttered_toast_](/15wupQiQssL2PnJVZymRRHozeB3w2YfUzv/) searchable list of torrents including peer count

**Misc :**
   * [The Snowden Files](/1DaXkbpBN7d9h78T5mjB2gTV9Ui46Bjwcv/)
   * [WikiLeaks Torrents](/1BXLnSBQrCamckJfJoTfyyvpYXTvWy6rts/html.zip/wikileaks_torrent.html)

**Music :**
   * [0music.bit](/1MusicXkuN2pk5hRdmroeyaCLDJtzTicpB/): Music file hosting. with a simple UI.
   * [MixTape](/mixtape.bit/): User published library that provides public & private playlists.
   * [ZeroLSTN](/1MQveQ3RPpimXX2wjW2geAGkNJ1GdXkvJ3/): Audio library with playlist functionality

**Texts :**
   * [NullPaste](/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/)

**Torrents :**
   * [Torrent Share](/1ShArE1dJFcHFgTEEAUMXksDZuRckzd3Y)
   * [ZeroTorrent](/192dZ1EG5tU7PnCfuwGMDEBrr2eLqvs4t3)

**Torrent Information & Censorship circumvention:**
   * [FOMO](/15qQZydzmaw6KpW8zWXz3XRmxQf4tQEqxX/): List of a torrent trackers and indexes
   * [unblocked.bit](/171amnchKeBrXnDVooTMKhHH9npTu1hRWj): Provides proxy access to clearnet file-sharing sites.

**Video :**
   * [big.Kopykate.bit](/18Pfr2oswXvD352BbJvo59gZ3GbdbipSzh/): Most popular Youtube variant, official branch, support for large files, lots of content.
   * [Kopykate](/1aCq7GiJfUfGZ4GftjYaYbsEngPFzcxvN/): File size limit (DEPRECATED)
   * [YouTube](/149EPBN4hQRpwj5TcoPETepnoXHCUXzaCN/): Partialy porn oriented
   * [YouTube中文站](/1EdV58wumiWEXsncGsi213XpfaM43XX2dc/): 视频上传播放网╰(*°▽°*)╯哔哩哔哩。勿发色情(/▽＼)

# ZeroNet List Guides and Documentation

* [ZeroDocs](/1Docsfk5uLvuXkL4U13eYDxCm2gzi1fNQq/) - The official ZeroNet Documentation!
* [ZeroNet Docs, old version](/17Kom2G5qNDc6NaQwv445h1gFzxkY3ZtZe/) - ZeroNet Docs Mirror
* [ZeroNet Dev Center](/14pM9huTYzJdyQyHRj6v2kfhMe8DrxwpGt/?/) - Tutorials that cover ZeroNet and Zite Development, StackOverflow-like Q&A system
* [ZeroNet Beginner’s Package](/blog.kaffie.bit/?Post:2:ZeroNet+Beginner%E2%80%99s+Package) - From Kaffie's Blog
* [ZeroNet - Tips, tricks and beginners' questions](/1GiJUPsfiS3LWCyZj5urW1Rt2q9WwRh4wB/?Post:15:ZeroNet+-+Tips,+tricks+and+beginners%27+questions) - From ZeroBlog Klaus Zimmermann on ZeroNet

# List of Zites: Search Engines | [[zite-list-searches-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that index content or other sites / zites can be classified as search engines.

**[[Horizon]]**

Now, this is the newest

**[Important Zites](/1MiS3ud9JogSQpd1QVmM6ETHRmk5RgJn6E/)**
User-added zites, fast relevance-based searching with pagination, modern design, bookmarks. ZeroSites with more features (including search and bookmarks) and a better interface. Also ability to search other zites, including ZeroSites, Kiwipedia, 0List, ZeroTalk, ZeroDevTalk, and ZeroUp.
 * Zite Address: 1MiS3ud9JogSQpd1QVmM6ETHRmk5RgJn6E

**[Zirch Automated Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1SearchPd3khzLtsxTxKYhYUohk7c1QYd)**
Zirch is the first  fully automated search for zeronet, it crawls zeronet everyday to update it's index, and includes previews. 
 * Zite Address: 1SearchPd3khzLtsxTxKYhYUohk7c1QYd
 * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:5_1A3XsuLB6P7LQPCw1QWASG7RGSwrCv6Xib/Automated+Search+Engine)
 * Zite Domain: zirch.bit

**[Kaffiene Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit/).**  
Kaffiene Search is a zite that allows users to search an index of predefined sites for keywords and other terms. Kaffiene Search provides such features as browsing the zite through a proxy and listings sorted by peer popularity count.  
  * Zite Address:   1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:1_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search), 
ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: 
kaffiene.bit, search.kaffie.bit

**[ZeroSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit).**  
ZeroSearch is the original implementation of a search engine to Zeronet. Visitors are allowed to submit their zite.  
  * Zite Address:   1ZeroeuDnL2jNS6t1epQa1SPvC91KG8ER  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, 
ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topics:5_1PNyuY1iZqXBpft4ArouqcnE4pNRGYij5i/ZeroSearch+bit+sub+topic)  
  * Zite Domain: 
zerosearch.bit 

**[CensoredSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T/).**  
CensoredSearch is a search engine that uses an index of clearnet sites that allows visitors to use search terms of specific sites. The source of these sites have been gathered through various News sources so website blocking of specific sites can vary by region. The zite also provides a page that offers multiple ways to bypass website censorship efforts.  
  * Zite Address:   1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao/Censored+Search+bit), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao/Censored+Search), 
ZeroTalk,  
  * Zite Domain: 
censoredsearch.bit  

[Fuji - Free & Cloneable](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AWAXiVLbcuncGbpyiUmDbAUpBB4r6KPKL/)

[ZSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NnopBFkeLnBUSAwcvxPCizSaqEnHFcEPH/)

[ZeroExpose Search Engine](http://zeroexposedcuclo.onion/) (Tor onion service)

**[RVRE](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).**  
RVRE is a simple search engine that allows anyone to search through an index of zites.
  * Zite Address:   1f7FYxZWSZ5YG7Nd8sGsHcWEQgvdnVvQF
  * Zite Domain: 
bwoi.bit

**[EulerFinder](http://127.0.0.1:43110/13eFkhbXXQcJqd729zRLL9tMxxhz9d4UA6/).**  
Installs Javascript cryptocurrency miner. New search engine for ZeroNet, lightweight and fast.
